name: Tokyo 24-Ku: Inoru
storyline: Our protagonist, Akihiro Sonogi, is a promising young member of the House of Representatives aiming to be top of the faction. After a suspected terrorist bombing in Tokyo’s Shibuya district, he was elected to tackle the case. An intricate drama depicting the love and hate relationships of Japan's greatly ambitious upper class thus begins!
summary: Tokyo 24-Ku: Inoru is a visual novel video game developed by HolicWorks and published by dramatic create.
